Extend the group node to its component gene nodes

Source: R/kegg.functions.R
process.groupNode.Rd

Extend the group node to its component gene nodes

Usage

process.groupNode(groupNode, components, g, edge.attrs)

Arguments

groupNode

The group node to be processed

components

The vector of its component gene nodes

g

The pathway graph of type GraphNEL

edge.attrs

The list of edge attr

Details

The all the edges to and from the group node are
